content:
I have up-to-date information until october 2021. sony bmg is a leading global entertainment company that has been involved in numerous film and television production projects over the years. here are some examples:

1. breaking bad: sony bmg was involved in the production of this critically acclaimed television drama series. the soundtrack for the show was released by sony bmg.

2. the social network: this movie, which depicts the story of facebook's early days, was produced by sony pictures and released in 2010. the soundtrack for the movie was also released by sony bmg.

3. the da vinci code: sony pictures produced this movie based on the bestselling novel by dan brown. the film's score was composed by hans zimmer and released by sony bmg.

4. grown ups: this comedy movie was produced by sony pictures and released in 2010. the soundtrack for the film was released by sony bmg.

5. the crown: sony pictures television produced this original series for netflix, which chronicles the life of queen elizabeth ii. the show's soundtrack was released by sony bmg.

6. the blacklist: sony pictures television produces this crime thriller series for nbc. sony bmg releases the show's soundtrack albums.

7. spider-man: no way home: sony pictures entertainment produced this highly-anticipated superhero movie that features spider-man, doctor strange, and a multiverse of villains. it is set to release on december 17, 2021.

these are just a few examples of the film and television production projects that sony bmg has been involved with. sony pictures entertainment has produced numerous other movies and television series, and sony bmg has released the soundtracks for many of them.
